description: Traction and weather protection combine seamlessly in the new Rush GTX, our latest offering in the Rush family. The Rush GTX is equally adept at high mileage trail runs in rugged terrain or at day hikes or light overnight trips in inclement weather, thanks to it’s GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable lining and innovative Free-dome™ IKS™ outsole, providing outstanding traction and stability.
name: Scarpa Rush GTX - Mens
